site-title: MiniGO - Uber Minimal Flat Coming Soon WP Plugin
form-validation-email: Please enter a valid email address.
page-1-content:
[minigo-logo]

Hello and welcome to MiniGO!

This premium WordPress plugin is the latest evolution of our mini-site platform

and has been designed to be quick to set-up, easy to use and customize.

[minigo-divider size="2px" top="60px" bottom="30px" style="divider-dashed" opacity="0.25"][PT_row][PT_column size="one-half lap-one-whole"][/PT_column][PT_column size="one-half lap-one-whole"][minigo-icon-features][/PT_column][/PT_row][minigo-divider size="2px" top="0px" bottom="30px" style="divider-dashed" opacity="0.25"][raw]

If so, you'll find in MiniGO a reliable, intuitive tool that gets the job done, saves you time and makes you look good. Scroll on.

[/raw]
page-2-content:
We wanted to show MiniGO off a little bit and see how we can take advantage of the huge flexibility built into the admin options and shortcodes. Here are the first 16 demos you can load up with one click in the admin and use as a base to edit. Let us know what other demos you'd like to see, we listen to feedback :)
[raw]

v3 Dark

3D, Fully Featured.

BASE #2

[minigo-divider size="2px" top="30px" bottom="60px" style="divider-dashed" opacity="0.15"][minigo-button text="Get MiniGO!" url="//pre.la/minigo-wp" class="buy" target="_blank" style="btn--large"] [minigo-divider size="2px" top="30px" bottom="30px" style="divider-dashed" opacity="0.15"]

Thank you so much for taking the time to check out MiniGO!

Have an awesomely creative day!

- The Premio Team -

contact_info.title: 345 Rodeo Drive San Jose, CA 95111, USA

counter_features.title: 5 Star Ratings
counter_features.text: What really matters is what users think and that's we try hardest.

counter_features.title: Average Rating
counter_features.text: We follow through with scalable, high quality code for any platform.

counter_features.title: Sales
counter_features.text: Robustness and reliability matters, proven and updated since 2014.

counter_features.title: Admin Options
counter_features.text: Along with 8 skins, 20 shortcodes and the freedom to do whatever you imagine.

icon_features.title: Strategy
icon_features.text: In a world of MVPs MiniGO lets you publish early, test and grow an idea efficiently  and with no fuss.

icon_features.title: Design
icon_features.text: Designed to have an unobtrusive UI, it lets your content speak and your visuals amaze. First impressions matter.

icon_features.title: Start-up?
icon_features.text: You're launching a new business and you need a professional placeholder website while you work on your theme?

icon_features.title: Freelancer?
icon_features.text: You're a contractor that needs a modern, responsive website to showcase your services or CV?

shop-before-content: You want to stand out from the crowd and impress clients with a quick mini-site when they sign on?
shop-code: you want to quickly test a MVP, build a prototype for a presentation or even start your own e-shop in hours?

testimonials.name: smokebv
testimonials.quote:
Had to ask for additional feature, and Octavian added the feature for me without any other cost.

Very nice, would recommend.

testimonials.name: Vygr10565
testimonials.quote:
Medal of Support!

This guys should get a medal for his support. He mailed me in seconds after I asked for support and helped me out.

Thx PremioThemes!

testimonials.name: mixalg
testimonials.quote: So far it looks like the best 'coming soon' plugin. and I've tried many. Thanks guys, great work.

testimonials.name: loolye
testimonials.quote:
Very beautifull plugin, the support is also great!

it's a best coming soon plugin i have seen!

testimonials.name: paelfrank
testimonials.quote: Great plugin!! Looks amazing and its easy to use!

testimonials.name: WickedT
testimonials.quote: This was my first theme ever and it was sooo easy to use!

testimonials.name: jrtorelli
testimonials.quote: Beautiful and easy to use. Thanks!

testimonials.name: caseyremy
testimonials.quote: one of the best plugins ive seen. excellent!

testimonials.name: sitesme
testimonials.quote: Great plugin for a quick "Under Maintenance" or "Under Construction" website. Very flexible and easy going. Saved me hours of work. Thank you and keep up the great work.

testimonials.name: Nick_P
testimonials.quote: Great theme with very quick and helpful support. Looking forward to there next work.

testimonials.name: daniel1908TT
testimonials.quote: Fixed my issues and offered to help if more support is needed!

testimonials.name: liciouzd12
testimonials.quote: The plugin is a lifesaver, it is fully customizable with an elegant design for the price. And when it comes to support, the seller is 100% there, even at odd hours of the week. I am very pleased with this purchase and would recommend them to everyone. Thanks a ton for making this so useful and easy!

testimonials.name: Holodigit
testimonials.quote:
It does what really need for a coming soon plugin and it does it well. 
A lot of options, elegant and effective. 
The best on the market.

testimonials.name: hyperhyper
testimonials.quote: What a great coming soon template. Some options to customize the text, content background colour and opacity are a few areas I would suggest improving upon but it really is a nice plugin. Well done.

testimonials.name: nategarrett
testimonials.quote:
This plugin has everything you would ever need for either a "Coming Soon" page or an "Under Construction" page.

Amazing work!!

testimonials.name: sailor1978
testimonials.quote:
Hello !

This word to tell you that your 2.0 version is purely AWESOME ! I never thought a coming soon plugin could offer such lots of visual configuration ! Plus, you added audio also as well as tons of styles, fonts, colors etc…the freaking MOST KILLER COMING SOON on codecanyon ! Hyper nice job !! I’m totally bluffed !

Cheers,
Seb

testimonials.name: ccgmodels
testimonials.quote: We've used many different Coming Soon plugins, but MiniGO is without a doubt the best one we've used to date! It has so many different features allowing us to create a page that looks and functions exactly how we want it to! Add in the simple SEO capabilities, easy controls, overall style and you've got yourself the complete package!

testimonials.name: ht10network
testimonials.quote:
The best solution we have found for WP sites. Made with deep thoughts on design and functionality to lake our work so much easier. 
Thanks a lot!

testimonials.name: JusBusines
testimonials.quote: The best coming soon/under-construction plugin in the entire forest period, everyone should have this plugin its beyond essential.

testimonials.name: ngohelp
testimonials.quote:
This is a well coded and very beautiful Coming Soon / Maintenance Mode WP Plugin. The best I've found.

It still looks good when viewed in older browsers that don't fully support the slideshow and countdown animations.

Thanks for the brilliant work!

testimonials.name: aristotle25
testimonials.quote: Really attractive and true multi purpose plugin! If you need a quick solution this plugin can cover any sort of page

testimonials.name: JNoire
testimonials.quote: Beautiful design and easy install. Than you so much for this elegant coming soon plugin! This is, hands down, the best looking Word Press plugin available. Worth every penny!

testimonials.name: NicoleAnthony
testimonials.quote: Such a slick coming soon page. Loads fast and works perfectly.

testimonials.name: E3E
testimonials.quote:
Love the design! Customer Support is A++++ Highly recommended all around. If you have a vision to get across with video as a stepping stone to your upcoming website this is it.

Support goes above and beyond to help with coding requests.

Thxs Again Guys!

testimonials.name: sterlingwilliam
testimonials.quote: I was just experimenting with this total Awesomeness!! Very easy to configure, has all the key options you could want, and just is Amazing (and luv the Ken Burns flow)!!

testimonials.name: pablito_r
testimonials.quote:
Exquisite designed, easy setup and works really well in different devices and browsers.

Perfect!

testimonials.name: in4fun
testimonials.quote:
Excellent lightweight script with no issues at all. 
Perfect layout in desktop and mobile view.

testimonials.name: mountainrunner
testimonials.quote: Simply the best design I've seen on themeforest and your documentation is stellar!
